LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.label: енергетична гвинтівка
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.description: A charged-shot assault rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.0.label: приклад
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeRifle.tools.1.label: ствол
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeRifle.label: енергетичний заряд
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.label: енергоспис
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.description: A pulse-charged rail-assisted lance weapon. It fires a single shot at high velocity, charging it with unstable energy as it leaves the acceleration rail.
LanguageData.Gun_ChargeLance.tools.0.label: ствол
LanguageData.Bullet_ChargeLance.label: заряд для енергосписа
